--- title: "Hands-on Exercise 9" author: "Chang Fang Yu" date-modified: "last-modified" execute: echo: True eval: True warning: false freeze: true --- # Modelling, Visualising and Analysing Network Data with R ### Import Data and Wrangling ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} pacman::p_load(igraph, tidygraph, ggraph, visNetwork, lubridate, clock, tidyverse, graphlayouts) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_nodes <- read_csv("data/GAStech_email_node.csv") GAStech_edges <- read_csv("data/GAStech_email_edge-v2.csv") ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_edges <- GAStech_edges %>% mutate(SendDate = dmy(SentDate)) %>% mutate(Weekday = wday(SentDate, label = TRUE, abbr = FALSE)) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_edges_aggregated <- GAStech_edges %>% filter(MainSubject == "Work related") %>% group_by(source, target, Weekday) %>% summarise(Weight = n()) %>% filter(source!=target) %>% filter(Weight > 1) %>% ungroup() ``` ::: ## Creating network objects using tidygraph ### Using tbl_graph() to build tidygraph data model. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_graph <- tbl_graph(nodes = GAStech_nodes, edges = GAStech_edges_aggregated, directed = TRUE) ``` ::: ### Reviewing the output tidygraph’s graph object ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_graph ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tbl_graph: 54 nodes and 1372 edges # # A directed multigraph with 1 component # # Node Data: 54 × 4 (active) id label Department Title 1 1 Mat.Bramar Administration Assistant to CEO 2 2 Anda.Ribera Administration Assistant to CFO 3 3 Rachel.Pantanal Administration Assistant to CIO 4 4 Linda.Lagos Administration Assistant to COO 5 5 Ruscella.Mies.Haber Administration Assistant to Engineering Group Mana… 6 6 Carla.Forluniau Administration Assistant to IT Group Manager 7 7 Cornelia.Lais Administration Assistant to Security Group Manager 8 44 Kanon.Herrero Security Badging Office 9 45 Varja.Lagos Security Badging Office 10 46 Stenig.Fusil Security Building Control # ℹ 44 more rows # # Edge Data: 1,372 × 4 from to Weekday Weight 1 1 2 Sunday 5 2 1 2 Monday 2 3 1 2 Tuesday 3 # ℹ 1,369 more rows ``` ::: ::: ### Changing the active object ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_graph %>% activate(edges) %>% arrange(desc(Weight)) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tbl_graph: 54 nodes and 1372 edges # # A directed multigraph with 1 component # # Edge Data: 1,372 × 4 (active) from to Weekday Weight 1 40 41 Saturday 13 2 41 43 Monday 11 3 35 31 Tuesday 10 4 40 41 Monday 10 5 40 43 Monday 10 6 36 32 Sunday 9 7 40 43 Saturday 9 8 41 40 Monday 9 9 19 15 Wednesday 8 10 35 38 Tuesday 8 # ℹ 1,362 more rows # # Node Data: 54 × 4 id label Department Title 1 1 Mat.Bramar Administration Assistant to CEO 2 2 Anda.Ribera Administration Assistant to CFO 3 3 Rachel.Pantanal Administration Assistant to CIO # ℹ 51 more rows ``` ::: ::: ## Plotting Static Network Graphs with ggraph package ### Plotting a basic network graph ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggraph(GAStech_graph) + geom_edge_link() + geom_node_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Changing the default network graph theme ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph) + geom_edge_link(aes()) + geom_node_point(aes()) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Changing the coloring of the plot ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph) + geom_edge_link(aes(colour = 'grey50')) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = 'grey40')) g + theme_graph(background = 'grey10', text_colour = 'white') ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Fruchterman and Reingold layout ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "fr") + geom_edge_link(aes()) + geom_node_point(aes()) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Modifying network nodes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "nicely") + geom_edge_link(aes()) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department, size = 3)) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "nicely") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department), size = 3) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Working with facet_edges() ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set_graph_style() g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "nicely") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department), size = 2) g + facet_edges(~Weekday) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set_graph_style() g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "nicely") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department), size = 2) g + facet_edges(~Weekday) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Working with facet_edges() ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set_graph_style() g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "nicely") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department), size = 2) + theme(legend.position = 'bottom') g + facet_edges(~Weekday) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### A framed facet graph ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set_graph_style() g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "nicely") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department), size = 2) g + facet_edges(~Weekday) + th_foreground(foreground = "grey80", border = TRUE) + theme(legend.position = 'bottom') ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Working with facet_nodes() ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set_graph_style() g <- ggraph(GAStech_graph, layout = "nicely") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department), size = 2) g + facet_nodes(~Department)+ th_foreground(foreground = "grey80", border = TRUE) + theme(legend.position = 'bottom') ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-18-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## Network Metrics Analysis ### Computing centrality indices ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- GAStech_graph %>% mutate(betweenness_centrality = centrality_betweenness()) %>% ggraph(layout = "fr") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department, size=betweenness_centrality)) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Visualising network metrics ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- GAStech_graph %>% ggraph(layout = "fr") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = Department, size = centrality_betweenness())) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ### Visualising Community ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- GAStech_graph %>% mutate(community = as.factor(group_edge_betweenness(weights = Weight, directed = TRUE))) %>% ggraph(layout = "fr") + geom_edge_link(aes(width=Weight), alpha=0.2) + scale_edge_width(range = c(0.1, 5)) + geom_node_point(aes(colour = community)) g + theme_graph() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](handson_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-21-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## Building Interactive Network Graph with visNetwork ### Data preparation ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_edges_aggregated <- GAStech_edges %>% left_join(GAStech_nodes, by = c("sourceLabel" = "label")) %>% rename(from = id) %>% left_join(GAStech_nodes, by = c("targetLabel" = "label")) %>% rename(to = id) %>% filter(MainSubject == "Work related") %>% group_by(from, to) %>% summarise(weight = n()) %>% filter(from!=to) %>% filter(weight > 1) %>% ungroup() ``` ::: ### Plotting the first interactive network graph ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Working with layout ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) %>% visIgraphLayout(layout = "layout_with_fr") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Working with visual attributes - Nodes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} GAStech_nodes <- GAStech_nodes %>% rename(group = Department) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) %>% visIgraphLayout(layout = "layout_with_fr") %>% visLegend() %>% visLayout(randomSeed = 123) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Working with visual attributes - Edges ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) %>% visIgraphLayout(layout = "layout_with_fr") %>% visEdges(arrows = "to", smooth = list(enabled = TRUE, type = "curvedCW")) %>% visLegend() %>% visLayout(randomSeed = 123) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### Interactivity ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} visNetwork(GAStech_nodes, GAStech_edges_aggregated) %>% visIgraphLayout(layout = "layout_with_fr") %>% visOptions(highlightNearest = TRUE, nodesIdSelection = TRUE) %>% visLegend() %>% visLayout(randomSeed = 123) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
